#summary Dependencies required for installing thrudb

==GettingStarted==

  1. install thrift dependencies
    * GNU build tools (Autoconf 2.59c+)
    * g++ 4.0+
    * boost 1.33.1+
    * libevent
    * cppunit
    * other language support depending on what you're developing in, perl, python, php, java, ruby, ...
  1. checkout and build thrift
    1. svn co http://svn.facebook.com/svnroot/thrift/trunk thrift
    1. cd thrift
    1. ./bootstrap
    1. ./configure
    1. make all
    1. sudo make install
  1. install thrudb dependencies
    * log4cxx
    * libmemcached (http://tangent.org/552/libmemcached.html)
    * spread v4 (optional, for replication backend and broadcast support)
    * libuuid
    * libssl
    * libcrypto
    * for thrudoc (optional, for backend support)
      * db_cxx (BerkeleyDB c++ support)
      * expat (S3 support)
      * mysql client
      * boost filesystem
    * for thrudex
      * CLucene (requires 0.9.18 or higher)
  1. checkout and build thrudb
    1. svn co http://thrudb.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ thrudb
    1. cd thrudb
    1. to build everything
      1. make
    1. to build specific portions, thrucommon is required, everything after is if you want it
      1. cd thrucommon
      1. ./bootstrap
      1. ./configure
      1. make all
      1. sudo make install
      1. repeat for each of the pieces you want, thrudoc, thrudex, thruqueue, throxy
